The Last of Us Season Two premiers on HBO on April 13, continuing Joel and Ellie’s journey through a land ravaged by a fungal pandemic. In anticipation of the show's return, a selection of cool Last of Us merch is up for grabs, and we've rounded up our favorites into the list below. This includes action figures, art books, a board game, and the official Last of Us a prequel comic book. You’ll even find a selection of hoodies and T-shirts, giving you a fun way to update your wardrobe. It’s also a good time to dive back into the video games or check them out for the first time.

The Last of Us: The Complete First Season Steelbook (4K)

$38 ($50)

Relive the first season of The Last of Us with this premium collection. Along with every episode, you’ll get over two hours of bonus features--including a look at how the show adapted the events of the games and other behind-the-scenes content. It also comes with a colorful (and frightening) steelbook, so you can show it off in your collection when not in use.

The Last of Us Video Games

The Last of Us Limited Edition DualSense

$85 | Releases April 10

Preorders open for this gorgeous DualSense on March 14, and it’s bound to sell out fast. Featuring a bunch of easter eggs hidden throughout the gamepad and a stylish black and white design, it’s arguably one of the best-looking DualSense Controllers we’ve seen. Note that this is a standard DualSense, not the premium DualSense Edge.

Action Figures

$40.20 ($50)

The Joel and Ellie Action Figure 2-Pack is discounted right now. Along with over 30 points of articulation, the duo includes heaps of accessories (such as weapons and swappable hands). Consider picking them up if you want a fun way to decorate your game room or home theater.

The Last of Us: Escape The Dark Board Game

$71.51 ($75)

Journey from the Quarantine Zone to Jackson in this cooperative board game. Thanks to a dynamic challenge system, you’ll encounter new obstacles each time you play--like encounters with FEDRA agents or the need to escape a horde of infected. Up to five players can join in on the action, and solo play is also supported.

Tubbz The Last of Us Vinyl Rubber Duck Figures

Looking for a way to combine your love for rubber ducks and The Last of Us? You’re in luck--Tubbz offers a few hilarious vinyl rubber duck figures based on the hit video game. Ellie and Joel are the highlights, but here’s a look at everything currently available.

See at Amazon:

  • Ellie -- $20
  • Joel -- $20
  • Joel (Mini Edition) -- $9
  • Bill -- $19.74 ($25)
  • Tess -- $16.67 ($20)
  • Bloater -- $30
  • Clicker -- $30

Youtooz Last of Us Collectibles:

A few cool collectibles are available from Youtooz, including two creepy versions of a Clicker and one featuring Joel with a crumbling city serving as the background. All three would make for excellent companions for your home office, with each standing about five inches tall.

See at Amazon:

  • Clicker -- $30
  • Clicker Illuminated -- $30
  • Joel -- $35

The Last of Us Art books

Go behind the scenes on the game's development with these premium art books. All three are hardcovers with around 200 pages of content--including concept art, commentary from the producers and artists, and more. The Art of the Last of Us Part 2 Deluxe Edition even comes with an exclusive cover and slipcase, plus a gallery-quality lithograph.

See at Amazon:

  • The Art of The Last of Us Part 2 Deluxe -- $63 ($90)
  • The Art of the Last of Us Part 2 -- $29.70 ($50)
  • The Art of The Last of Us -- $36 ($50)

The Last of Us: American Dreams Prequel Comic

$16.76 ($20)

The Last of Us: American Dreams is a prequel comic set before the first game. It follows 13-year-old Ellie as she navigates life in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. Along with a closer look at her life before meeting Joel, it also features concept art and behind-the-scenes sketches. This collection includes all four issues of American Dreams.

The Last of Us Edition Paladone Home Goods

Paladone makes a few officially licensed home goods based on The Last of Us. This includes a mug with a design that changes when exposed to heat, a Firefly Light that makes a cool nightlight, and a glow in the dark water bottle.

See at Amazon:

  • Water Bottle -- $29.45
  • Firefly Light -- $27
  • Heat Change Mug -- $14

Official Last of Us Licensed Hoodies

A whole bunch of officially licensed hoodies are up for grabs. These are available in a variety of sizes, colors, and designs, and there’s bound to be something that fits your style.

Official Last of Us Licensed T-Shirts

Many of the same hoodie designs are available as T-shirts. These are also much cheaper, typically costing around $20.

The Last of Us Statues

Created by Dark Horse, these statues are a premium way to decorate your space. Several models have sold out, but both the Dark Horse Store and Walmart have a few in stock--including figures for Joel, Ellie, and Abby. Standing about nine inches tall, they’re much more luxurious than the Joel & Ellie Action Figure 2-Pack.
